resource_explanation:
El Plano user's events API(event created by user).

Event attributes :

 - `title` - Represents event name.
 - `description` - Represents event detailed description.
 - `status` - Represents event current status.
   - `confirmed` - The event is confirmed. This is the default status.
   - `tentative` - The event is tentatively confirmed.
   - `cancelled` - The event is cancelled (deleted).

 - `recurrence` - Represents recurrence rules.
 - `timezone` - Timezone settings.
 - `start_at` - Represents when event starts.
 - `end_at` - Represents when event ends.
 - `timestamps`

 Also, includes reference to the event creator and attached course.

parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.description: Recurrence rules if an event is recurrent

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: The course identity to which the event is attached

requests.request_body: {"event":{"title":"Aut magnam sit.","description":"Aut voluptatem aspernatur. Recusandae dicta veritatis. Qui ut ad. Molestiae quia repellat. Laudantium totam et.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-08-07","end_at":"2019-08-09","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"],"course_id":1}}
requests.curl:
curl "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/events" -d '{"event":{"title":"Aut magnam sit.","description":"Aut voluptatem aspernatur. Recusandae dicta veritatis. Qui ut ad. Molestiae quia repellat. Laudantium totam et.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-08-07","end_at":"2019-08-09","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"],"course_id":1}}' -X POST \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer d85efbd1ad4eaef08bc0607e68a34efd50f924008150de9e5027b05a88a6f696" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
	-H "Cookie: "
